oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects in Calves of Mixed Infections With Bovine Viral Diarrhea Virus and Several Other Bovine Viruses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Castrucci, G.
Ferrari, M.
Traldi, V.
Tartaglione, E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BVDV infection
viral infections
infectious bovine rhinotracheitis
bovid herpesvirus-4
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the present study therefore, was to determine whether the clinical response to BVDV infection might be altered by the intervention of other viral infections affecting cattle, such as those induced by infectious bovine rhinotracheitis (IBR), parainfluenza-3 (PI-3) viruses, and bovid herpesvirus-4 (BHV-4).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 1; 184-189
